name: anonymous health and wellbeing survey y2 2023

question_3.question: How many years of seismic offshore experience do you have?

question_4.question: Which vessel do you work on?

question_5.question: How many hours per day (on - and off shift) do you spend sitting orphysically inactive?

question_6.question: How often do you go outside to get some fresh air during a day?

question_7.question: How often do you do exercise in your time off per week?

question_8.question: How many servings of fruit and vegetables do you usually eat per day (athome and at work)?

question_9.question: How many days a week do you usually eat fast food or food that is highin fat and salt (at home and at work)?

question_10.question: Healthy options that I want to eat are served onboard?

question_11.question: When was the last time you had your cholesterol measured?

question_12.question: When was the last time you had your blood pressuremeasured?

question_13.question: Iâ€™m comfortable seeing the Medic if I feel unwell.

question_14.question: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?

question_15.question: In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?

question_16.question: In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going yourway?

question_17.question: In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up sohigh that you could not overcome them?

question_18.question: How often are you able to stay in touch with your family and friends while offshore?

question_19.question: How often do you socialize with you colleagues off shift?

question_20.question: Welfare and sports offerings onboard are good?

question_21.question: I am comfortable seeing the Medic if I feel distressed or down.

question_22.question: Are you aware of the emotional support services provided by PGS

question_23.question: How often have you felt unsafe at work during the last 6 months?

question_24.question: The safety culture in my department is good

question_25.question: I don't have a problem stopping the job if I see anything unsafe

question_26.question: How often do you feel a rush to complete a job quickly?

question_27.question: How often are you distracted or find it difficult to concentrate?

question_28.question: On an average day, I usually get the following hours of sleep

question_29.question: I am able to adapt when changes occur

question_30.question: I tend to bounce back after illness, injury or other hardships
